channel.title: Error starting Whonix gateway and workstation
channel.description:
Hello everyone! I am getting this error Error starting domain: Request operation not valid: blkio device weight is valid only for bfq or cfq scheduler
I am using qemu virtmanager and operating system is Pop!_OS.

item.title: Error starting Whonix gateway and workstation
item.dc:creator: pussport2
item.description:
Yes, sorry I missed that note. Thank you for pointing it out, it worked.

Read full topic
item.source: Error starting Whonix gateway and workstation

item.title: Error starting Whonix gateway and workstation
item.dc:creator: ChiefGyk3D
item.description:
The installation notes state this is a known issue for Ubuntu you have to go to the XML and wipe several lines see notice at top of kvm install instructions

Read full topic
